text:
🔴 STATEMENT: @ComeceEu & @CaritasEuropa are urging the EU institutions to ensure #vaccine access for all, promoting a “widescale vaccination not only for Europe´s own safety and protection, but also for global public health as a public good”. #Covid19

📰 https://t.co/kYuFRMR6AQ https://t.co/mmOYlEkzBX
